duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing anesthesia monitoring and recovery for patients.
Collecting patient histories and performing physical exams.
Performing nursing care of Internal Medicine Patients.
Performing Venipuncture/IVC placement and blood transfusion therapy.
Conducting laboratory work and diagnostic imaging such as ultrasound, radiology, CT and MRI.
Assisting in diagnostic procedures such as endoscopy, rhinoscopy, and fluoroscopy.
Communicating effectively with clients regarding the status of their pets and home care.
Processing laboratory samples in-house and preparing laboratory samples for outside labs.
Working collaboratively with team members of all hospital services and providing Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy (HBOT)
